examples: Absurdly , he concluded his oration with a song.
definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the mid 16 century.

examples: The critics were absurdly extravagant with their praise.
definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the mid 16 century.

main_definition: In an absurd fashion. [First attested in the mid 16 century.]
secondary_definitions: To an extreme degree. [First attested in the mid 16 century.]
